statements: SELECT * FROM HazardousMaterialsDisposalRecord;
SELECT id, material_name, quantity FROM HazardousMaterialsDisposalRecord ORDER BY disposal_date DESC;
SELECT material_name, quantity, disposal_method FROM HazardousMaterialsDisposalRecord WHERE regulations_met = TRUE;
SELECT id, disposal_date, disposal_method, regulations_met FROM HazardousMaterialsDisposalRecord WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT id, material_name, disposal_method, regulations_met FROM HazardousMaterialsDisposalRecord WHERE disposal_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM HazardousMaterialsDisposalRecord ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT material_name, quantity, disposal_date FROM HazardousMaterialsDisposalRecord WHERE regulations_met = 'true' ORDER BY disposal_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT material_name, disposal_method FROM HazardousMaterialsDisposalRecord WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY material_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM HazardousMaterialsDisposalRecord WHERE disposal_method LIKE 'Incineration%' AND regulations_met = 'false';
SELECT AVG(quantity) AS avg_quantity, MAX(quantity) AS max_quantity, MIN(quantity) AS min_quantity FROM HazardousMaterialsDisposalRecord WHERE disposal_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM HazardousMaterialsRecords WHERE disposal_method='Landfill' ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT material_name, disposal_date FROM HazardousMaterialsRecords WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY disposal_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM HazardousMaterialsRecords WHERE disposal_method='Recycling' AND quantity < 50;
SELECT agency_name, regulations_text FROM RegulatoryAgencies;
SELECT agency_name, contact_person FROM RegulatoryAgencies WHERE agency_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM HazardousMaterialsRecords WHERE material_name = 'Acetone'
SELECT material_name, disposal_method FROM HazardousMaterialsRecords WHERE quantity > 100
SELECT * FROM HazardousMaterialsRecords WHERE disposal_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT material_name, quantity FROM HazardousMaterialsRecords WHERE disposal_method LIKE '%Incineration%'
SELECT * FROM RegulatoryAgencies ORDER BY agency_name DESC
SELECT * FROM hazardous_materials;
SELECT material_name, disposal_location FROM hazardous_materials WHERE disposal_method = 'recycling';
SELECT * FROM disposal_locations ORDER BY location_name ASC;
SELECT regulation_name, regulatory_body, regulation_date FROM regulations WHERE regulation_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT material_name, disposal_date, disposal_location FROM hazardous_materials WHERE disposal_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT material_name, disposal_location FROM hazardous_materials;
SELECT * FROM disposal_locations ORDER BY location_name ASC;
SELECT regulation_name, regulatory_body FROM regulations WHERE regulatory_body = 'EPA';
SELECT material_name, disposal_method FROM hazardous_materials WHERE disposal_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT material_name, disposal_location, disposal_method FROM hazardous_materials JOIN disposal_locations ON hazardous_materials.disposal_location = disposal_locations.location_name;
SELECT * FROM waste_disposal_records;
SELECT material_name, disposal_date FROM waste_disposal_records WHERE compliance_status = true ORDER BY disposal_date DESC;
SELECT disposal_method, COUNT(*) AS total_disposals FROM waste_disposal_records GROUP BY disposal_method;
SELECT * FROM disposal_companies WHERE location = 'California';
SELECT * FROM regulatory_agencies ORDER BY agency_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM waste_disposal_records WHERE compliance_status = true ORDER BY disposal_date DESC
SELECT material_name, disposal_method FROM waste_disposal_records WHERE disposal_method = 'Landfill'
SELECT company_name, location FROM disposal_companies ORDER BY company_name ASC
SELECT agency_name, contact_person, phone_number FROM regulatory_agencies WHERE phone_number LIKE '555%'
SELECT category_name, description FROM material_categories
SELECT * FROM HazardousMaterials;
SELECT material_name, material_type FROM HazardousMaterials ORDER BY material_name ASC;
SELECT site_name, site_location FROM DisposalSites WHERE site_location = 'New York';
SELECT material_name FROM HazardousMaterials WHERE material_type = 'Chemical';
SELECT material_name, disposal_date FROM HazardousMaterials JOIN DisposalRecords ON HazardousMaterials.material_id = DisposalRecords.material_id;
SELECT * FROM HazardousMaterials WHERE material_type = 'Explosive';
SELECT material_name, material_type FROM HazardousMaterials WHERE material_type = 'Toxic' ORDER BY material_name DESC;

SELECT D.site_id, D.site_name, R.regulation_description FROM Regulations R JOIN MaterialRegulations MR ON R.regulation_id = MR.regulation_id JOIN HazardousMaterials H ON MR.material_id = H.material_id JOIN DisposalSites D ON D.site_id IN (SELECT site_id FROM DisposalRecords WHERE material_id = H.material_id) ORDER BY D.site_id, R.regulation_description ASC;

SELECT H.material_name, COUNT(D.record_id) AS disposal_count FROM HazardousMaterials H LEFT JOIN DisposalRecords D ON H.material_id = D.material_id GROUP BY H.material_name HAVING disposal_count > 5 ORDER BY disposal_count DESC;

SELECT D.site_id, D.site_name, COUNT(D.record_id) AS disposal_count FROM DisposalSites D LEFT JOIN DisposalRecords DR ON D.site_id = DR.site_id GROUP BY D.site_id, D.site_name HAVING disposal_count > 1 ORDER BY disposal_count ASC;
